amendment.description: An amendment to require a report to House and Senate Intelligence committees describing any authorization granted during the past 10 years to engage in intelligence activities related to the overthrow of a democratically elected government.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 110-144 to require a report to House and Senate Intelligence committees describing any authorization granted during the past 10 years to engage in intelligence activities related to the overthrow of a democratically elected government.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
